amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit use of funds to initiate the process of contracting out, outsourcing, privatizing, or converting any Federal government services in contravention of P.L. 105-270.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to initiate the process of contracting out, outsourcing, privatizing, or converting any Federal government services in contravention of P.L. 105-270.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wynn amendment (A010) Failed by voice vote.
